thread.title: BRIEF-Hedy Holding's shares to resume trade after announcing Focus Media deal
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Hedy Holding's shares to resume trade after announcing Focus Media deal | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Hedy Holding's shares to resume trade after announcing Focus Media deal
text:
Sept 1 Hedy Holding Co Ltd
* Says trading of shares to resume on Sept 2 after announcing deal with Focus Media
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1XaHJh1
Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
